  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/936</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/936</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Discurs directe i indirecte</string>
            <string language="en">Direct and indirect, or reported, speech</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Direkt und indirekt oder berichtet, Rede</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Direct et indirect, ou enregistré, la parole</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Direto e indireto, ou relatado, discurso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Diretto ed indiretto, o segnalato, discorso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αμεσος και έμμεσος, ή, ομιλία</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva sobre la utilització del discurs directe i l'indirecte i els canvis que s'hi produeixen. Conté activitats d'autoavaluació, pràctiques i un enllaç per saber-ne més.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on the use of direct and indirect, or reported, speech and the inherent changes. It includes self-assessment and practice activities, and a link for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua catalana</string>
            <string language="en">Catalan language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua catalana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">sintaxi</string>
            <string language="en">syntax</string>
            <string language="es">sintaxis</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf dem Gebrauch direkten und indirekten oder berichtet, 
Rede und die zugehörigen Änderungen. Er schließt 
Selbstbewertung und Praxisaktivitäten und ein Link für weitere 
Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur
l'utilisation de direct et d'indirect, ou enregistré, la parole et 
les changements inhérents. Elle inclut art de l'auto-portrait-assessment et 
activités de pratique, et un lien pour de plus amples informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) no uso 
de direto e de indireto, ou relatado, discurso e as mudanças 
inerentes. Inclui atividades do self-assessment e da prática, e
uma ligação para uma informação mais adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) 
sull'uso di diretto e di indiretto, o segnalato, discorso ed i 
cambiamenti inerenti. Include le attività di pratica e di 
valutazione di se stesso e un collegamento per ulteriori informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στη χρήση 
άμεσος και έμμεσος, ή, ομιλία και οι έμφυτες αλλαγές. 
Περιλαμβάνει την αυτοαξιολόγηση και πρακτικής τις 
δραστηριότητες, και συνδέσεων για περισσότερες πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Katalanische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Syntax</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">syntaxe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sintaxe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua catalan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sintassi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καταλανική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σύνταξη</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
